title: Task 121

question.text: What are features in the context of software?

answers.answer: The different functions or parts of the software
The problems or bugs found in the software.

answers.feedback: Features refers to functionalities, not physical appearance.
Features refers to software aspects, not the developers.

description: In software, features refer to the various functions, parts, or aspects of the software. Each feature, like a login process or a payment system, is a specific capability or function that the software offers.
